text: The Kardashian family (often called the Kardashian-Jenner family) is an American family who are known for their involvement in entertainment and media. The family became known when Robert Kardashian was O. J. Simpson's lawyer. Robert married Kris Kardashian and had four children: Kourtney, Kim, Khloé and Rob. After the death of Robert Kardashian in 2003, Kris married Bruce Jenner (now Caitlyn Jenner) and they had two children: Kendall and Kylie. Before marrying Kris, Bruce already had four children: Burt, Cassandra, Brandon and Brody. Kris and Bruce divorced when he transitioned into a woman. Kourtney had three children with Scott Disick. Kim had four children with Kanye West. Khloé had two children with Tristan Thompson. Kylie had two children with Travis Scott. They have been called as "America's most famous family" by Glamour, "one of the most influential family 'dynasties' in the world" by Insider, and the biggest influencers of the 2010s by Vogue. ==References==
title: Kardashian family
